rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with north-facing design for positive energy. Features a large window to enhance natural light.
An open, airy space with Bohemian decor and vibrant colors. Natural materials integrated into the walls and floors to meet Vastu principles.
A modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and a north-facing window for good lighting, aligning with Vastu guidelines. The layout ensures a smooth flow from the dining area to living space.

A spacious master bedroom with a focus on comfort and aesthetic appeal. Bohemian elements are integrated through textiles, art and natural lighting via north-facing windows, in line with Vastu principles.
A cozy guest bedroom with a calm ambiance. Decor incorporates bohemian textures and soft hues, ensuring energy balance as per Vastu.
A dedicated workspace designed for productivity and creativity. Features ample natural light from north-facing windows and ergonomic furniture arranged per Vastu norms.

openings.description: A robust, aesthetically pleasing entrance that adheres to Vastu by facing the north.
Large windows placed strategically on the north for maximum light and positive energy flow.
Enhances indoor-outdoor connection with natural elements while following Vastu recommendations.
